name: Name
baseAttack_effect: Select one target and attempt an Attack Resolution.  When your Attack Resolution has succeeded and your opponent has failed their Dodge Resolution, your attack may deal [[1d6]] point(s) of damage.
battlefield_movement_effect: The next round of the begins, and all the players participating in the battle are plot again.
items_painkiller_comment: Can be used at any time. If you use this Item, you can restore your [HP] or [SAN] by one point.
items_weapon_comment: It can be used during a battle when you roll the die to make an action. You can roll your dice again regardless of the result of the roll.
items_talisman_comment: You can use it when someone other than yourself rolls a die to make an action. Regardless of the roll result, you can roll the dice again.
items_net_launcher_comment: Can be used during your turn in combat. Choose one target with a physical presence and apply a -1 modifier to the target's evasion rolls for the duration of the combat. This modifier does not stack.
items_b_amnestic_comment: Can be used after completing an important action in the main phase. Forget all the 【Information】 you have acquired, and return any uncurrent 【Madness】 to the deck.
items_detonator_comment: Can be used during your turn in combat. Select one D-rank employee as the target and eliminate the target.
list_respect2: Participated Until the End of the Session
